title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, there are multiple unnecessary redraws occurring. This causes inefficient performance. The issue can be reproduced by following the steps below.
OB: Currently, there are multiple redraws happening during text change with word wrap in StyledText.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be a maximum of one redraw for each visible line while changing the text with word wrap in StyledText.
SR: To reproduce the issue and observe the redraws, add the following line to the performPaint method in StyledText: System.out.println('lineCount ' + lineCount + ', paintY ' + paintY + ', renderHeight ' + renderHeight);
